title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 106.5 - Other instructions applicable
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 106.5 - Other instructions applicable

State Regulations

In making any allocations of joint expenses, companies shall observe the general instructions regarding allocation bases (see section
109.3, infra). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
106.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
